thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Pain Therapeutics Resubmits New Drug Application For Remoxy ER

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Pain Therapeutics Resubmits New Drug Application For Remoxy ER
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Pain Therapeutics Inc:
* PAIN THERAPEUTICS RESUBMITS NEW DRUG APPLICATION FOR REMOXYÂ® ER, AN ABUSE-DETERRENT, EXTENDED-RELEASE DRUG CANDIDATE FOR THE TREATMENT OF CHRONIC PAIN
* PAIN THERAPEUTICS INC - COMPANY EXPECTS A SIX-MONTH REVIEW CYCLE BY FDA FOR REMOXY NDA
* PAIN THERAPEUTICS INC - EXPECTS TO BE NOTIFIED BY FDA OF A PRESCRIPTION DRUG USER FEE ACT (PDUFA) DATE WITHIN 60 DAYS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
